name: Agathe
description:
Agathe is hand knitted from 'chocolate' Alpaca select yarn (100% alpaca). Her clothes are all 100% cotton 4ply, her dress is in 'bloom' and 'cream', tights in 'ripple' and 'cream' and shoes in 'bloom' with 'cream' french knot buttons. Please note that her clothes are not removable.

She  is 10" (26 cms) high

She is made from all new materials and is stuffed with a high grade carded polyester filling which conforms to British standards: cleanliness BS 1425 and fire safety BS 5852. It is a suitable component  of articles requiring BS 5665 and the European standard EN71 and those required to carry the CE logo.

Although all of my animals are made and finished to a high standard they are not intended for use as a child’s toy but offered for sale as a decorative and/or collectable items.

name: Berthold
description:
Berthold is hand knitted from very soft  'sand'  Blue Sky organic cotton yarn (100% organic undyed cotton). His jumper is 100% cotton 4ply in a 'cream' and 'bloom' nordic design and is removable.

He is 13" (33cms) high 

This item is made from all new materials and is stuffed with a high grade carded polyester filling which conforms to British standards of cleanliness BS 1425 and fire safety BS 5852. It is a suitable component  of articles requiring BS 5665 and the European standard EN71 and those required to carry the CE logo.

Although this item is made and finished to a high standard it is not intended for use as a child’s toy.

It is offered for sale as a decorative and/or collectable item.

name: Per
description:
Per is hand knitted from 'porridge' Rowan Scottish Tweed (100% wool from the Isle of Harris). His jumper is 100% cotton 4ply in a 'cream' and 'bloom' nordic design and can be removed.

He is 8.5" (22 cms) high

This item is made from all new materials and is stuffed with a high grade carded polyester filling which conforms to British standards of cleanliness BS 1425 and fire safety BS 5852. It is a suitable component  of articles requiring BS 5665 and the European standard EN71 and those required to carry the CE logo.

Although this item is made and finished to a high standard it is not intended for use as a child’s toy.

It is offered for sale as a decorative and/or collectable item.

description:

This item is made from all new materials and is stuffed with a high grade carded polyester filling which conforms to British standards of cleanliness BS 1425 and fire safety BS 5852. name: Liesl
description:
Liesl is hand knitted from natural rose grey alpaca Farm Yarn (100% baby alpaca - undyed and organically farmed). Her jumper is 100% cotton 4ply in 'cream' with a lace heart design and can be removed.

She is 13" (33cms) high

This item is made from all new materials and is stuffed with a high grade carded polyester filling which conforms to British standards of cleanliness BS 1425 and fire safety BS 5852. It is a suitable component  of articles requiring BS 5665 and the European standard EN71 and those required to carry the CE logo.
